NewsArticle.title: NewsArticle
NewsArticle.description: Represents a news article fetched and processed by the system.

title.description: The title of the news article.

headline_hi.description: The title of the news article translated into Hindi.

summary.description: A short summary of the news article.

category.description: The category of the news article (e.g., World, Business, Tech).

region.description: The region the news article pertains to (e.g., US, IN, Global).

link.description: URL to the original source of the news article.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of when the news article was published.

status.description: The publication status of the article.

JobPosting.title: JobPosting
JobPosting.description: Represents a job posting scraped from various job APIs.

title.description: The title of the job posting.

source.description: The source of the job posting (e.g., External, Internal).

link.description: URL to the original job posting.

posted_at.description: The date the job was posted.

is_active.description: Whether the job posting is currently active.

Tender.title: Tender
Tender.description: Represents a tender opportunity scraped from open tender portals.

description.description: Detailed description of the tender requirements and scope.

url.description: URL to the original tender document.

closingDate.description: The closing date for submitting the tender.

Ad.title: Ad
Ad.description: Represents an advertisement request submitted by a user.

businessName.description: The name of the business submitting the ad.

paymentId.description: The payment transaction ID for the ad placement.

status.description: The current status of the ad request.

submittedAt.description: The timestamp when the ad was submitted.

/news/{newsId}.description: Stores news articles. Includes fields like 'title', 'headline_hi', 'summary', 'category', 'region', 'link', and 'timestamp'.

/jobs/{jobId}.description: Stores job postings. Includes fields like 'title', 'company', 'source', 'link', 'posted_at', and 'is_active'.

/tenders/{tenderId}.description: Stores tenders. Includes fields like 'title', 'organization', 'description', 'url', and 'closingDate'.

/ads/{adId}.description: Stores advertisement requests. Includes 'businessName', 'paymentId', 'status', and 'submittedAt'. Writable by admins only.
